fields.options: Export Credit Insurance Guarantee Company Botswana (Pty) Ltd

fields.label: Matter
fields.options:
The Insured has accepted an offer of indemnity made by CREDSURE pursuant to a proposal for Export Cred Insurance completed by the Insured. Now therefore subject to the teams and conditions of this policy BEC agrees that in the event of a CAUSE OF LOSS* (8) resulting in the Insured not receiving Payment of a INSURED DEBT* (7) arising from any INSURABLE TRANSACTION * (1), BECI will indemnify the Insured to the extent of the INSURED PERCENTAGE* (11) of the AMOUNT OF LOSS* (10), subject to the MAXIMUILIABILITY* (15)

As defined


SIGNED for and on behalf of BECI
